events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it does not fit me at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer’s message referencing a refund request.
Assigning this refund case to agent Sarah M. for further assistance and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you’d like a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been used or washed?
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 789456123, and the jacket is brand new, never worn or washed.
We will initiate a full refund upon receiving the returned jacket. Please use the prepaid return label included in your shipment.
That sounds great, thank you for the clear instructions. I will send it back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing your refund case now. Thank you for contacting us, and please reach out any time if further support is needed.
